descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jordan Poole does his best Steph Curry impersonation as he knocks down the logo 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Poole makes logo 3

videos.description: Andrew Wiggins drives down the lane and hangs in the air for impressive layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wiggins gets massive hang time on impressive bucket) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wiggins gets massive hang time on impressive bucket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cory Joseph knocks down shot) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo works hard on the offensive glass and is able to convert the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Diallo works hard on offensive glass for and-1) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Diallo works hard on offensive glass for and-1

videos.description: Cade Cunningham knocks down the 3-pointer, forcing Golden State to take a timeout.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham's 3 forces a Warriors' timeout) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham's 3 forces a Warriors' timeout

videos.description: Juan Toscano-Anderson's remarkable save leads to a Jordan Poole 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wild possession ends in Poole 3) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Warriors' ugly possession somehow ends in Poole 3

videos.description: Andrew Wiggins picks off the pass, then throws down the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wiggins gets the steal and slam) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wiggins gets the steal and slam

videos.description: Chris Chiozza shows off the range on triple

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chris Chiozza shows off the range on triple) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chris Chiozza shows off the range on triple

videos.description: Frank Jackson shows off the range on 3

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Frank Jackson shows off the range on 3) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Frank Jackson shows off the range on 3

videos.description: Andrew Wiggins knocks down the impressive jumper on Cade Cunningham. Then Jordan Poole's reverse layup forces a Pistons timeout.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wiggins, Poole put in sweet buckets in the 4th) 2021/11/19 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wiggins, Poole put in sweet buckets in the 4th

videos.description: Frank Jackson's 3-pointer to tie goes in and out as the Warriors hold on to beat the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Pistons' tying shot attempt goes in and out) 2021/11/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pistons' tying shot attempt goes in and out

videos.description: The Warriors pull out the 105-102 win over the Pistons without Steph Curry, Draymond Green and several other key pieces.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (The short-handed Warriors hold on to beat the Pistons) 2021/11/19 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: The short-handed Warriors hold on to beat the Pistons

videos.description: Steph Curry plays a game of rock-paper-scissors with a fan for a pair of shoes.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Misc. (Steph has some fun with fan and plays rock-paper-scissors) 2021/11/19 ESHEET 3PV

videos.headline: Steph has some fun with fan and plays rock-paper-scissors
